hero.description: Press Opt/Alt + M. Search Chrome tabs, bookmarks, and history instantly. Stop digging, start finding.
hero.privacy_note: Local-only privacy. No data leaves your device.

steps.invoke_desc: Press Opt/Alt + M to open from any page.
steps.search_desc: Tabs by default. /b bookmarks. /h history. /setting settings.
steps.open_desc: Enter to open. Cmd/Ctrl + Enter forces web search.

features.title: Features & Preview
features.subtitle: Designed around one flow: invoke, search, open.
features.unified_desc: One input for tabs, bookmarks, history, URL navigation, and web search fallback.
features.keyboard_desc: Opt/Alt + M to open, ↑/↓ to navigate, Enter to open, Esc to close.
features.command_desc: Use /b for bookmarks, /h for history, and /setting to open preferences.
features.polished_desc: Themes, opacity control, and multilingual UI with instant updates.
features.privacy_desc: No backend. Your data stays on-device, only used to power search and navigation.

cta.title: Ready to speed up your workflow?
cta.desc: Join users who have stopped digging through tabs and started finding them instantly.
cta.footer: Open Source • Local Data • No Tracking

meta.title: MiaoMint — Command Palette for Chrome Tabs, Bookmarks & History
